Detailed Description

Time synchronization parameter handle structure.

Field Documentation

timeStamp TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::clockTime

Clock time to set

delayReqRespParams_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::delayParams

Delay params for Delay Response

int32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::drift

Drift(nanoseconds)

emdaConfig_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::edmaConfig

Pointer to EDMA parameters

ICSS_EmacHandle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::emacHandle

icss emac handle

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::enabled

PTP Enable/Disable status

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdDelayReq

Event ID for Delay Request frame

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdFlwUpGenerated

Event ID to indicate follow up frame generated

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdPdelayReq

Event ID for Pdelay Request frame

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdPdelayResp

Event ID for Pdelay Response frame

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdPdelayRespFlwUp

Event ID for Pdelay Response Follow Up frame

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::eventIdSync

Event ID for Sync frame

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::pathDelay[NUM_PORTS]

Line delay or Peer Delay for each port

peerDelayParams_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::pDelayParams[NUM_PORTS]

Peer Delay params

EventP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::ptpPdelayReqEvtHandle[NUM_PORTS]

Two event handlers for two ports for processing Pdelay request frames

EventP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::ptpPdelayResEvtHandle[NUM_PORTS]

Two event handlers for two ports for processing Pdelay response and Pdelay response follow up

EventP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::ptpSendFollowUpEvtHandle[NUM_PORTS]

Two event handlers for two ports for sending out follow up frame in case of forced 2-step

ptpFrameTypes_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::rxFrameType

Frame type received. Valid values: 0,1,2,3

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::rxPort

Port used for receive. Valid values: ICSS_EMAC_PORT_1/ ICSS_EMAC_PORT_2

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::rxprotocol

protocol. Valid values: gPTP/PTCP 0/1

timeStamp* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::rxTimestamp_gPTP

timestamp if rxprotocol=gPTP

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::sequenceIdIn

Sequence ID

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::sequenceIdOut_rxTS

Sequence ID

ptpDparams_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::stackParams

PTPd stack parameters

uint32_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::syncInterval

Sync interval(nanoseconds)

syncParam_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::syncParam[NUM_PORTS]

Delay params for Sync Frame

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_announceTxTask

PTP Task for sending Announce frames

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_backgroundTask

Used to do resource intensive but non-critical tasks like doing floating point calculations, algorithms, status monitoring etc

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_delayReqSendTask

Time Sync Task handle for sending a delay request to Master on receiving a Sync

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_latchSyncTask

Task is used to synchronize with the 1PPS output via the latch interrupt

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_NRT_Task

For processing frames like Pdelay Request, Pdelay Response and Pdelay Response Follow Up which don't require real time response

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_pDelayReqSendTask

Time Sync Task handle for Delay Request Task which sends task periodically

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_syncTxTask

Actual PTP Task handle which sends Sync frames

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_TxTSTaskP1

PTP Task for storing Tx timestamps for Port 1

TaskP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::timeSync_TxTSTaskP2

PTP Task for storing Tx timestamps for Port 2

timeSync_NrrInfo_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::tsNrrInfo[NUM_PORTS]

Data for calculating NRR on both ports

timeSync_RuntimeVar_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::tsRunTimeVar

Time Sync Runtime variables

timeSync_SyntInfo_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::tsSyntInfo

Data for Syntonization

timeSync_ToD_Param_t* TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::tsToDParams

Parameters for doing time of day synchronization

ptpFrameTypes_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::txFrameType

Frame type transmitted. Valid values: 0,1,2,3

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::txPort

Port used for transmit. Valid values: ICSS_EMAC_PORT_1/ ICSS_EMAC_PORT_2

uint8_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::txprotocol

Transmitted frame protocol. Valid values: gPTP/PTCP 0/1

EventP_Handle TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::txTSAvailableEvtHandle[NUM_PORTS]

Event handle for indicating that a Tx Timestamp interrupt has been generated and needs to be serviced. index 0 contains handle for Port 1.

ipParams_t TimeSync_ParamsHandle_s::udpParams

IP/UDP Params
